turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm trying to place a order at the Starbucks on 4th and Seneca in Seattle, Washington. I was hoping you could help me with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking today I'll try the iced cafe mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I want to try the venti iced with almond milk and just a dab of whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti iced mocha with almond milk and a dab of whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of milk did you say?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know what? Instead, I think I've had it with almond milk. Didn't like it. Let's just go with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, whole milk instead of almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on 4th and seneca.
